Reinventing Direct Action: Alternatives to Theatrical Militancy

We’ve been laying low on tha animal rights stuff for tha sake of union among ranks for quite a while now, mainly getting down with tha blues on shitty days or beating tha crap outta Portuguese comics for tha fun of it on the rebound.

Well, we’re feeling kinda vindicated right about now, almost considering going back to real politics.

mais atitude sff!

fanzine do contra com cultura: uma outra cena de banda desenhada desalinhada desdenhada de propaganda punk veggie anti-nazi com humor & depressão q/b
